card.name: Geist of Saint Traft
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Whenever Geist of Saint Traft attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking. Exile that token at end of combat.

card.name: Bonds of Faith
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 as long as it's a Human. Otherwise, it can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What cannot be destroyed will be bound."—Oath of Avacyn

card.name: Cathedral Sanctifier
card.property: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."

card.name: Champion of the Parish
card.property: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of the Parish.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stand for every cobbler, tanner, and fool in this town—and they stand for me."

card.name: Chapel Geist
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death has bound it with chains of past regrets. Forever it searches for atonement, each kindness removing a single link.

card.name: Dearly Departed
card.property: Flying As long as Dearly Departed is in your graveyard, each Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never forget our ancestors. They have not forgotten us."—Mikaeus, the Lunarch

card.name: Doomed Traveler
card.property: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

card.name: Eerie Interlude
card.property: Exile any number of target creatures you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The barrier between existence and oblivion is thinner than you know.

card.name: Elder Cathar
card.property: When Elder Cathar dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If that creature is a Human, put two +1/+1 counters on it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My greatest hope is that you will surpass me in every way, consigning my name to some forgotten corner of history."

card.name: Emancipation Angel
card.property: Flying When Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

card.name: Fiend Hunter
card.property: When Fiend Hunter enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature. When Fiend Hunter leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Gather the Townsfolk
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Human creature tokens. Fateful hour — If you have 5 or less life, create five of those tokens instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the memories of those they lost lies the strength needed to defend their city.

card.name: Goldnight Redeemer
card.property: Flying When Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Host sings of Avacyn's return without a single verse about its own suffering.

card.name: Increasing Devotion
card.property: Create five 1/1 white Human creature tokens. If Increasing Devotion was cast from a graveyard, create ten of those tokens instead. Flashback {7}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Momentary Blink
card.property: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Moorland Inquisitor
card.property: {2} {W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

card.name: Rebuke
card.property: Destroy target attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction."—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Slayer of the Wicked
card.property: When Slayer of the Wicked enters the battlefield, you may destroy target Vampire, Werewolf, or Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You don't want to see his trophy room.

card.name: Spectral Gateguards
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Spectral Gateguards is paired with another creature, both creatures have vigilance.

card.name: Thraben Heretic
card.property: {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them decry me for burning the dead. I'm not giving those ghoulcallers any more fuel for their madness."

card.name: Topplegeist
card.property: Flying When Topplegeist enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, tap target creature that player controls.

card.name: Village Bell-Ringer
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Village Bell-Ringer enters the battlefield, untap all creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Priests, hunters, slayers—to arms! The enemy approaches!"

card.name: Voice of the Provinces
card.property: Flying When Voice of the Provinces enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her horn is heard across Innistrad, lifting the hearts of the righteous.

card.name: Captain of the Mists
card.property: Whenever another Human enters the battlefield under your control, untap Captain of the Mists. {1}{U}, {T}: You may tap or untap target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am no mere ship's captain. The north wind is my accomplice. The tide is my first mate."

card.name: Gryff Vanguard
card.property: Flying When Gryff Vanguard enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghouls smashed the door, but I heard the call of the gryffs and knew we were saved."—Ekka, shopkeeper of Hanweir

card.name: Mist Raven
card.property: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

card.name: Nephalia Smuggler
card.property: {3} {U}, {T}: Exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My drivers are trustworthy. I removed their tongues myself. Any other questions?"

card.name: Pore Over the Pages
card.property: Draw three cards, untap up to two lands, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "'I'm certain that the fate of Markov Manor is connected to these cryptoliths . . .' This Tamiyo was on to something."

card.name: Tandem Lookout
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

card.name: Tower Geist
card.property: Flying When Tower Geist enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jenrik's tower is served by those who once sought to enter it uninvited.

card.name: Butcher's Cleaver

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Outside the safety of Thraben, there is little distinction between tool and weapon.

card.name: Sharpened Pitchfork

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not everyone can have a sword of blessed silver. Not everyone needs one, either.

card.name: Seraph Sanctuary
card.property: When Seraph Sanctuary enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. Whenever an Angel enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Tranquil Cove
card.property: Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield tapped. When Tranquil Cove enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mindwrack Demon
card.property: Flying, trample When Mindwrack Demon enters the battlefield, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. Delirium — At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 4 life unless there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Compelling Deterrence
card.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Then that player discards a card if you control a Zombie.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Havengul Runebinder
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Zombie creature you control.

card.name: Makeshift Mauler
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Makeshift Mauler, exile a creature card from your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It always amazes me what perfectly good things people throw away."—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Relentless Skaabs
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Relentless Skaabs, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Scrapskin Drake
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Scrapskin Drake can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars killed my skaabs down below. Let's see how high their swords can reach."—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

card.name: Screeching Skaab
card.property: When Screeching Skaab enters the battlefield, put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its screeching is the sound of you losing your mind.

card.name: Stitched Drake
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Stitched Drake, exile a creature card from your graveyard. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best skaabs are more powerful and more beautiful than the sum of their parts."—Stitcher Geralf

card.name: Abattoir Ghoul
card.property: First strike Whenever a creature dealt damage by Abattoir Ghoul this turn dies, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death took his humanity but not his skill with the knife.

card.name: Appetite for Brains
card.property: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it with converted mana cost 4 or greater and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just as with a peach, the first bite is always the juiciest.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.property: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must all make sacrifices for the good of Innistrad."—Sorin Markov

card.name: Butcher Ghoul
card.property: Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without a mind, it doesn't fear death. Without a soul, it doesn't mind killing.

card.name: Diregraf Ghoul
card.property: Diregraf Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At least this one still has arms and legs. Well, most of its legs."—Enslow, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Dread Return
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The will to return can overpower the will to survive.

card.name: Driver of the Dead
card.property: When Driver of the Dead dies, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some vampires resorted to corpse trading after cathars burned their estates and drove them from their ancestral feeding grounds.

card.name: Falkenrath Noble
card.property: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

card.name: Ghoulraiser
card.property: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh."—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Gravecrawler
card.property: Gravecrawler can't block. You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Innistrad's ghoulcallers are talented enough, but let me show you what someone with real power can create."—Liliana Vess

card.name: Harvester of Souls
card.property: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all."—Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

card.name: Human Frailty
card.property: Destroy target Human creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen a hundred mortal families rise and fall. I shall outlast a thousand more."—Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Moan of the Unhallowed
card.property: Create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For a ghoul, every village is a buffet and every disaster is a reunion.

card.name: Sever the Bloodline
card.property: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Tooth Collector
card.property: When Tooth Collector enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Delirium — At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, target creature that player controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Tribute to Hunger
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Marella was delighted. The ball had attracted so many suitors for her daughter, including that handsome stranger. She wondered where the two were now . . . .

card.name: Unbreathing Horde
card.property: Unbreathing Horde enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard. If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Victim of Night
card.property: Destroy target non-Vampire, non-Werewolf, non-Zombie creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not touch a drop. Not yet. I want to watch this so-called slayer's last crisis of faith."—Olivia Voldaren

card.name: Diregraf Captain
card.property: Deathtouch Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1. Whenever another Zombie you control dies, target opponent loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though its mind has long since rotted away, it wields a sword with deadly skill.

card.name: Cobbled Wings
card.property: Equipped creature has flying. Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the necro-alchemist, any puzzle can be solved with intelligence and harvested body parts.

card.name: Dismal Backwater
card.property: Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield tapped. When Dismal Backwater enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Swamp
card.property: ({T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.)
